title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label does not adjust accordingly.
EB: The label height should be adjusted to accommodate the new font size.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label to the software. 2. Edit the font size of the label to '18 points'.
